remarks.format:
## Remarks If a mobile control provides templated rendering features through device templates, it must create instances of each template inside a separate control of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TemplateContainer>. If a data-binding expression is in a control in a template, the `Container` variable of the expression is always of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TemplateContainer>.
